attributes.action: Make it compulsory for a 'one-in-one-out' system to be used at busy junctions when in slow moving traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drivers who are queuing in slow traffic to be made to allow a car at an approaching junction right of way if safe to do so. This will enable fairness, reduce queuing times and alleviate pressure on our already overcrowded roads.
